title: Giant Tales From The Misty Swamp
description: Adventure is found in a mysterious thick wooded swamp where amphibians are about to jump right off the page. Something strange is happening where people are missing but reptiles are found. If you like tales from the swamp, then this is the book for you.Come see how 20 authors did a remarkable job using the themes of disguises, a race against time, and a search for something lost. In this collection of short stories, you will find four chapters full of fun thrilling tales that bring forth all new entertainment.
author: Heather Marie Schuldt
